name: Black and Light
description:
Made for Qazi Jam 7.

Game Engine: Godot

Theme: Black and White

Source: https://bitbucket.org/uncscrewtape/qazijam7

How to play

  1. Before you start decided which player will be WHITE and which will be BLACK.
  2. White player goes first.
  3. At the start of each turn you will be presented with 3 tetromino patterns. This pattern is how you will interact with the light squares for that turn.
  4. Your pattern you will either activate a light based on your player color or you will swap an already lit light to the opposite color.
  5. After 10 rounds whoever has the most lights wins.
